Posts.Content: Spedteacher33 wrote: Two days ago I notice a small indentation on my aerola on the left breast. Last summer I had normal bi-rad 2 results on my mammogram and sonogram. I take Estradiol 1 mg daily for surgical menopause. I have noticed some pain in the nipple, but I figured it was due to the estrogen I am taking. I have never heard of indentations on the areola, so I was wondering if this is a normal problem woman face during menopause. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Indentation on aerola Spedteacher33 Klairey-1955
